scripts.build: rimraf ./build && npm run build-frontend && npm run build-app-actions
scripts.build-app-actions: cd app-actions && npm ci && cd .. && node build-actions.js
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && npm ci --include=dev && BUILD_PATH=../build npm run build
scripts.build:dev: rimraf ./build && npm run build-frontend && npm run build-app-actions:dev
scripts.build-app-actions:dev: cd app-actions && npm ci && cd .. && NODE_ENV=development node build-actions.js
